Malaysia reinstates cabotage waiver for foreign ships for undersea cable repairMalaysia on Friday re-instated an exemption to its cabotage policy to allow foreign vessels to repair undersea cables in its waters, Transport Minister Anthony Loke said, adding that the government is looking to make the move permanent. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 07:49:32 GMT VYRIANE4LZN33F4OUL2ZFXNB3I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysia-reinstates-cabotage-waiver-foreign-ships-undersea-cable-repair-2024-03-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
China's parliament to unveil more stimulus next week, bold reforms unlikelyChina's parliament is expected to unveil moderate stimulus plans to stabilise growth at an annual meeting beginning on Tuesday, but may disappoint those calling for a detailed roadmap of bold policies to fix the country's deep structural imbalances. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 06:10:37 GMT 5BJFCA57N5MILBHXB5HZY3QVIA https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-parliament-unveils-more-stimulus-next-week-ball-reforms-unlikely-2024-03-01/Kevin Yao世界中国
Singapore's air force to add more stealth fighters as it phases out older jetsSingapore will buy eight more F-35 stealth fighters, eventually replacing its older F-16s and putting the Singaporean air force "in the premier league" as regional threats grow, the city-state's defence minister said this week. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 06:09:58 GMT BYTH2TPWAJIKLIYOWGSU2D6ZHM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/singapore-air-force-add-more-stealth-fighters-it-phases-out-older-jets-2024-03-01/Gerry Doyle世界亚太地区
What causes Bangladesh's major industrial accidents?At least 44 people died and 22 were critically injured in the Bangladesh capital of Dhaka after a massive blaze broke out in a biryani restaurant to rage through a six-storey building. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 05:21:58 GMT DGXMF6WSANMSXB2YKUCNBGX3L4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/what-c​​auses-bangladeshs-major-industrial-accidents-2024-03-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russia ready to hand over crash victims' bodies to Ukraine, RIA saysRussia is ready to hand over to Ukraine the bodies of the victims of a January military plane crash, the RIA news agency cited Russian human rights official Tatyana Moskalkova as saying on Friday. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 05:02:43 GMT AABSTWSZSVJWZDKUMKVH7EOECA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-ready-hand-over-crash-victims-bodies-ukraine-ria-says-2024-03-01/Reuters世界欧洲
With Labour in his sights, left-winger Galloway wins in English townVeteran left-wing political maverick George Galloway won a vote to become the new lawmaker for the English town of Rochdale on Friday, vowing to be a thorn in the side for the opposition Labour Party before a national election it is tipped to win. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 03:04:44 GMT WX2ERUG2FFJZFIIIG3封装2VQ https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/with-labour-his-sights-left-winger-galloway-wins-english-town-2024-03-01/Elizabeth Piper世界英国
Taiwan faces steady 'drip' of pressure as China tightens pre-inauguration squeezeTaiwan is facing a steady "drip, drip" of Chinese pressure ahead of the inauguration of its next president in May, with officials in Taipei fearing Beijing could further squeeze the island's room to manoeuvre without resorting to direct conflict. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 02:59:36 GMT 6KX3SDFKLJOTHFQG4QQ6H7TWYU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-faces-steady-drip-Pressure-china-tightens-pre-inauguration-squeeze-2024-03-01/Yimou Lee, Ben Blanchard世界亚太地区
New species of Amazon anaconda, world's largest snake, discoveredResearchers in the Amazon have discovered the world's largest snake species - an enormous green anaconda - in Ecuador's rainforest that split off from its closest relatives 10 million years ago though they still nearly look identical to this day. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 02:03:58 GMT N55PH2S6BJPZPAWVCDL3462BJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/new-species-amazon-anaconda-worlds-largest-snake-discovered-2024-03-01/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
Iran rulers seek big turnout in election amid mounting discontentIranians voted for a new parliament on Friday, seen as a test of the clerical establishment's legitimacy at a time of growing frustration over economic woes and restrictions on political and social freedoms. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 01:47:38 GMT MMCNQGH3HFMZXJ6O332A4CAW3M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hardliners-set-tight-grip-iran-vote-frustration-mounts-2024-03-01/Parisa Hafezi世界中东地区
Alexei Navalny to be buried in Moscow amid uncertainty, tight securityRussian opposition politician Alexei Navalny will be buried in Moscow later on Friday amid tight security and fears of a police crackdown two weeks after he suddenly died at the age of 47 in an Arctic penal colony. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 00:05:26 GMT 2MRUSUTRD5MV7DDBVIONDM4TXQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/alexei-navalny-to-be-buried-moscow-amid-uncertainty-tight-security-2024-03-01/Reuters世界欧洲
US Senate defeats bid to stop F-16 fighter jet sale to TurkeyThe U.S. Senate on Thursday soundly defeated an effort to stop the $23 billion sale of F-16 fighter jets and modernization kits to Turkey, which President Joe Biden's administration approved after Turkey approved Sweden's joining the NATO alliance. Thu, 29 Feb 2024 21:23:42 GMT 4YSDYPCI6NNDBCDDI22I4GFDWI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-senate-defeats-bid-stop-of-16-fighter-jet-sale-turkey-voting-continues-2024-02-29/Patricia Zengerle世界
